thread.title: Gunman dressed as Santa kills at least 35 in Istanbul nightclub
thread.title_full: Gunman dressed as Santa kills at least 35 in Istanbul nightclub

title: Gunman dressed as Santa kills at least 35 in Istanbul nightclub
text:
Gunman dressed as Santa kills at least 35 in Istanbul nightclub Province’s governor describes attack during New Year celebrations as a terror attack about an hour ago 
The nightclub where a gun attack took place during a New Year party on January 1st, 2017 in Istanbul. 
Medics carry a wounded victim on a stretcher to an ambulance after a gun attack on Reina, a popular night club in Istanbul. Photograph: EPA Previous Image Next Image A gunman believed to have been dressed in a Santa Claus costume has opened fire at an Istanbul nightclub during New Year celebrations, killing at least 35 people and wounding 40 others in what the province’s governor described as a terror attack.
